data.description: Analysis of complex or compound hand weave techniques. Individual development of solutions to problems of structural textile design.
data.title: TEXTILE DESIGN: WEAVING II

data.description: The relationship of hand weaving to textural surfaces and sculptural forms are examined through the study of problems including structure, pattern, composition, and additional conceptual technical possibilities. Content is explored in the development of individual direction and in relationship to the discussion of historical and contemporary textiles and other works of art. Pursue an advanced investigation of concept and technique of hand-woven cloth.
data.title: TEXTILE DESIGN: WEAVING I
